thumb|Véro Tshanda Beya Mputu 
 
Véronique Tshanda Beya Mputu bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na Congo
O meriri Africa Movie Academy Award maka Best Actress in a Leading Role site n'ịrụ ọrụ aha na Felicite.
A mụrụ Mputu ma zụlite ya na Kinshasa, isi obodo Democratic Republic of Congo.

N'afọ 2017, ọ pụtara na Felicite, nke gosipụtara na 67th Berlin International Film Festival. N'ịkọwa ọrụ ya, ọ kọwara na obi dị ya ụtọ maka echiche nke ịrụ ọrụ nke na-egosi ụmụ nwanyị dịka ndị na-adabere n'onwe ha na ndị na-adịghị adabere na ụmụ nwoke iji mee ihe. O meriri onye na-eme ihe nkiri kachasị mma na 13th Africa Movie Academy Awards na Lagos, Nigeria. E nyekwara ihe nkiri ahụ dịka ntinye Senegalese na 90th Academy Awards, na-aghọ ihe nkiri mbụ sitere na mba ahụ a ga-enyefe na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke emume mmeri ahụ. The Times kwuru na arụmọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ahụ dịka isi ihe dị elu nke ihe nkiri ahụ, na-akọwa ya dịka "onye dike na onye mmeri".
A kọrọ na o nwere nnwale anọ iji mee ka onye nduzi, Alain Gomis, onye na-enweghị mmasị inye ya ọrụ ahụ kwenye.
